ui_metadata.display_name: CIS Microsoft Windows 10 Stand-alone v3.0.0 L1

variables.name: LEGAL_CAPTION_TEXT
variables.info: This is the window caption text for the login warning a user receives when logging onto the system.

variables.name: LEGAL_NOTICE_TEXT
variables.default: All activities performed on this system will be monitored.
variables.info: This is the window text for the login warning a user receives when logging onto the system.

variables.name: BUILD_VERSION
variables.info: Windows build Version found under HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows Nt\Currentversion:CurrentBuild

variables.name: PASSWORD_HISTORY
variables.info: Computer Configuration\Policies\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Account Policies\Password Policy\Enforce password history

variables.name: MAXIMUM_PASSWORD_AGE
variables.info: Computer Configuration\Policies\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Account Policies\Password Policy\Maximum password age

variables.name: MINIMUM_PASSWORD_AGE
variables.info: Computer Configuration\Policies\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Account Policies\Password Policy\Minimum password age

variables.name: MINIMUM_PASSWORD_LENGTH
variables.info: Computer Configuration\Policies\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Account Policies\Password Policy\Minimum password length

variables.name: PLATFORM_VERSION
variables.info: The version of Windows 10 to match against in the platform check.

variables.name: LOCKOUT_DURATION
variables.info: Computer Configuration\Policies\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Account Policies\Account Lockout Policy\Account lockout duration

variables.name: LOCKOUT_RESET
variables.info: Computer Configuration\Policies\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Account Policies\Account Lockout Policy\Reset account lockout counter after

variables.name: LOCKOUT_THRESHOLD
variables.info: Computer Configuration\Policies\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Account Policies\Account Lockout Policy\Account lockout threshold

variables.name: PASSWORD_AGE_PROMPT
variables.info: Computer Configuration\Policies\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Local Policies\Security Options\Interactive logon
